name: DreamHouse Slash Commands
description: Slack Slash commands implementation for the DreamHouse sample application.

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: Consumer key of your Salesforce Connected App

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Consumer secret of your Salesforce Connected App

SF_USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for your integration user

SF_PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for your integration user

SLACK_HOUSE_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the house slash command
